tool_description: Analyzes systematic sound correspondences between language pairs to identify regular phonological changes and sound laws.

target_phonemes.description: Corresponding phonemic forms in target language

context_sensitive.description: Whether to analyze context-dependent sound changes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: source_phonemes and target_phonemes must have equal length.
Insufficient data: At least 2 phoneme pairs required for sound correspondence analysis.
Invalid IPA notation: One or more phonemic transcriptions contain invalid IPA symbols.
Language pair not supported: The language pair lacks sufficient historical documentation.
Inconsistent correspondences: No regular sound patterns detected in the provided data.
usage: Provide aligned phonemic forms from two languages. The tool identifies systematic sound correspondences and potential sound laws governing the relationship.

confidence_levels.description: Confidence scores for each correspondence rule (0-1)

irregular_cases.description: Word pairs that don't follow regular sound patterns

sound_law_summary.description: Summary of major sound laws identified
